Resistance.help: Oni are resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Confuse and Taunt. They have improved Defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks and are excellent runners. The Oni has a Fiery Katana and can cast Fire Blast.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res(Melee, Ranged, AoE), +DEF(All but Psionics), +SPD,

Train.help: This Oni has been Trained. He now has a seconds attack with his Fiery Katana, can cast Ring of Fire and has Fire Breath.

Char.help: Incapacitates a distant foe by Charring him with smoldering soot and cinders. The target is left helpless, choking on the soot. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Char.targetHelp: The Soot is causing damage to you and preventing you from acting.

Rain_of_Fire.help: Summons a Rain of Fire over a targeted location, burning foes and reducing their movement speed within a large area. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Long
Rain_of_Fire.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

Enlighten.help: This Oni has been Enlightened. He can now cast Char and Rain of Fire.
